publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-8 Mr Tom McCabe: That this Parliament agrees that the office of the Clerk should be open on each of the following days: Monday 24 to Thursday 27 May, Tuesday 1 to Friday 4 June, Monday 7 to Friday 11 June and Monday 14 to Friday 18 June. Supported by : Michael Russell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton and Iain Smith Â
